## Load data

```{r load_data}
# load data
fn = dir(file.path('results', 'ageDPFs'),
         pattern = paste("coverage_table_one_brain.csv", 
                         sep = "_"))[1]
coverage_table = read.csv(file.path('results', fn)) 
coverage_table$activity[coverage_table$activity == "Together_1" | coverage_table$activity == "Together_2"] = "Together"
coverage_table <- coverage_table %>%
  mutate(cluster = factor(case_when(cluster == "1_1" ~ "1", 
                                    cluster == "2_2" ~ "2",
                                    cluster == "3_3" ~ "3", 
                                    TRUE ~ "X")),
         group = factor(group),
         dyadType = factor(case_when(dyadType == "True" ~ "Real",
                                     dyadType == "False" ~ "Pseudo")),
         activity = factor(activity)) %>%
  mutate(id = factor(id))
str(coverage_table)
```

## Fit model

```{r fit, message=FALSE}
# define model
model1a <- 'coverage ~ cluster*activity*dyadType*group'

# fit model
fit1a = glm.nb(model1a, data = coverage_table)
anova(fit1a)
summary(fit1a)
```

## Contrast analysis

```{r contrasts, message=FALSE}

# Get all estimated means in data frame
emm1a <- emmeans(fit1a, specs=~cluster*activity*dyadType*group, data=coverage_table, type="response") 
df.emm1a <- emm1a %>% as_tibble()

# Custom contrasts
patterns <- list()
groups <- levels(coverage_table$group)
dyadTypes <- levels(coverage_table$dyadType)
activities <- levels(coverage_table$activity)
clusters <- levels(coverage_table$cluster)
n_groups <- length(groups)
n_dyadTypes <- length(dyadTypes)
n_activities <- length(activities)
n_clusters <- length(clusters)
for (in_group in 1:n_groups) {
  for (in_dyadType in 1:n_dyadTypes) {
    for (in_activity in 1:n_activities) {
      for (in_cluster in 1:n_clusters) {
        pattern <- rep(0, n_groups*n_dyadTypes*n_activities*n_clusters)
        index <- (in_group - 1) * n_dyadTypes * n_activities * n_clusters + 
          (in_dyadType - 1) * n_activities * n_clusters +  
          (in_activity - 1) * n_clusters + in_cluster
        pattern[index] <- 1
        patterns[[paste0("c-", clusters[in_cluster], "_task-", 
                         activities[in_activity], "_d-", 
                         dyadTypes[in_dyadType], "_g-", 
                         groups[in_group])]] <- pattern
      }
    }
  }
}
# Contrast pseudo vs. real
contrast(emm1a, method = list("C1 Alone Intergen" = patterns$`c-1_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-1_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "C1 Alone Same gen" = patterns$`c-1_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-1_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Same gen`,
                              "C1 Together Intergen" = patterns$`c-1_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-1_task-Together_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "C1 Together Same gen" = patterns$`c-1_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-1_task-Together_d-Real_g-Same gen`,

                              "C2 Alone Intergen" = patterns$`c-2_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-2_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "C2 Alone Same gen" = patterns$`c-2_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-2_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Same gen`,
                              "C2 Together Intergen" = patterns$`c-2_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-2_task-Together_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "C2 Together Same gen" = patterns$`c-2_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-2_task-Together_d-Real_g-Same gen`,

                              "C3 Alone Intergen" = patterns$`c-3_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-3_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "C3 Alone Same gen" = patterns$`c-3_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-3_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Same gen`,
                              "C3 Together Intergen" = patterns$`c-3_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-3_task-Together_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "C3 Together Same gen" = patterns$`c-3_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-3_task-Together_d-Real_g-Same gen`,

                              "CX Alone Intergen" = patterns$`c-X_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-X_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "CX Alone Same gen" = patterns$`c-X_task-Alone_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-X_task-Alone_d-Real_g-Same gen`,
                              "CX Together Intergen" = patterns$`c-X_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Intergen` - patterns$`c-X_task-Together_d-Real_g-Intergen`,
                              "CX Together Same gen" = patterns$`c-X_task-Together_d-Pseudo_g-Same gen` - patterns$`c-X_task-Together_d-Real_g-Same gen`
                              ))
```
